Main functions

Source: R/0docs.R
main_.Rd

Documentation for common arguments.

Arguments

ont

An ontology of class ontology_DAG.

terms

A vector of ontology term IDs.

g

tbl_graph object.

force_new

Create a new file instead of using any cached files.

save_dir

Directory to save a file to.

save_path

File name to save to.

obj

R object.

Value

R object.
